title: A Solution for Jealousy - Novel Updates
tags: Based on a Song   Modern Day   Short Story   Vocaloid
author: Fujitani Touko   Honeyworks
description:
A novel adaption of HoneyWorks “Yakimochi no Kotae (A Solution for Jealousy)“ about Mochizuki Souta (nickname: Mochita), a third-year at Sakuragaoka High School, who holds long-standing unrequited feelings for her the air-headed pretty girl, Akari, who’s the president of the Art Club.

As the Art Club helps the Film Club with making a movie, he musters up the courage to confess and she actually accepts?! But when they accidentally witness Natsuki and Haruki’s “confession,” things start to get complicated….?>
